CRDoc: [Congressional Record Volume 160, Number 37 (Wednesday, March 5, 2014)] [Extensions of Remarks] [Page E306] 113 2 PERSONAL EXPLANATION HON. ERIC A. ``RICK'' CRAWFORD of arkansas in the house of representatives Wednesday, March 5, 2014 Mr. CRAWFORD. Mr. Speaker, on Tuesday, March 4th, 2014 I was inadvertently detained on rollcall Votes 91 and 92. Had I been present to vote I would have voted ``yes'' on both.
